main event: A bright white light about the size of a dime was sighted by an observer in Medway, Ohio.
interesting points: A Piper 117 airplane was sent to search for the object, but no further observations were made due to insufficient lighting in the airplane.
The observers were unable to get a good look at the object due to lack of data.
Mr. and Mrs. Steven J. Forster reported seeing a large, lighted object hovering in the sky while driving through Medway, Ohio.
The object was described as being approximately 50-60 feet in diameter and 10-15 feet thick, with a bright, glowing red color and an array of red and white lights around the outer edge.
The object remained relatively stationary for several minutes before taking off at a high rate of speed in a northerly direction.
sighted object: bright white light, large lighted object
witnesses: observer, Mr. and Mrs. Steven J. Forster
